about_the_game:
The creepy catacombs of the Cursed Kingdoms are yours to explore with this bounty of battlebacks! You'll find ruins and caves, a mysterious shrine, a solemn statue, corridors, a cavern, burial recesses and a blazing portal to the unknown. Take a trip with artist Joel Steudler, but bring a length of rope, a sword, and your wits. Mix and match the upper and lower halves to create your own ideal architecture!

...and be sure to check out the other products in the Cursed Kingdoms line!

Features:

* 11 Upper Backgrounds, 9 floors, and one terrifying cursed portal (active and inactive)
* .png files at 1000x740
* For use in RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice!
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Cursed Kingdoms Battlebacks" and "RPG Maker MV - Cursed Kingdoms Battlebacks" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
